thi-ap29:3.1: 9 Yasodharāpamukhadasabhikkhunīsahassaapadāna → dasabhikkhunīsahassāpadānaṃ (bj) | dasasahassatheriyāpadānaṃ (s2, s3) | yasovatīpamukkhāni dasabhikkhunī sahassāni apadānaṃ (pts1)
thi-ap29:7.1: sabbapati hohi → sabbapati hoti (s2, s3) | sabbā patī honti (pts1)
thi-ap29:8.3: Dīgharattañca no → dīgharattamidaṃ (s2, s3, mr) | dīgharattaṃ mayaṃ (pts1)
